item.title: Powershell Error on Invoke-Sqlcmd? Ditch the pipe operator.
item.description: As you might have read, I'm a fan of GTD. Having to develop a quick batch solution for some data copying between different SQL Server databases, I chose to use Powershell scripting and the Invoke-SqlCmd cmdlet. However I was faces with unexpected errors for something as trivial as an export/import job.
